title: [LOVE] Ep. 265 How To Be Your Authentic Self & Create Real Love In Your Life  with Jamie Rea
itunes:title: [LOVE] Ep. 265 How To Be Your Authentic Self & Create Real Love In Your Life  with Jamie Rea
description:
This week, Ash talks with Jamie Rea, a transformation coach with deep insights into relationships. Jamie is here to discuss how to return how to yourself.

 

Ash and Jamie discuss the truth beneath masculine and feminine source energy and how valuable this topic is for coming back to your true essence. Jamie shares the energetic pathway to receive joy and love from the person of your dreams. 

 

This episdoe is for you if you are ready to step into the depths of yourself, connect with your energy and move towards more love within your life!

 

In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  1. The revealing of karma: what karma is, and what happens when it shows up.
  2. How to disipher the true reason behind running away or being “busy”.
  3. Feminine and masculine source essence: combining energy movement and connection through the body.  
  4. Insights and phylosophies around returning home to yourself.
  5. A process to recover from trauma and become reborn as yourself.
  6. The unconscious stories you tell yourself about what love you deserve.

 

Where You Can Connect with Jamie Rea

 @jamie.n.rea



SOUL CBD

 

Here is something just for you to sleep more deeply, reduce stress and heal anxiety. 

 

Visit ashleystahl.com/soul and use the code YOUTURN at checkout for 15% off your order!
